content: @WG-learning according to the calendar in ~ 1h 45mins we have a meeting to talk about the lecture Representing types in rustc, ask questions, and keep the chapter going :)
hmmm did we decide a weekly meeting?
no, we are having bi-weekly meetings but I think we agreed on getting together again to have a second discussion about ty
if doesn't work we can postpone
well seems like I'm wrong, I was just following what the calendar says :)
we ended with a recurring event on the calendar
sorry about it, but it seemed to me that we've said we wanted to have a new meeting
that's why my confusion
Oh! I am mistaken then. I assumed the extra meeting was one time only to come to a conclusion. I am sorry.
this lecture is open, yes? I don't see it in my calendar...maybe i subscribed to a different one? i watched this one but unsure where to go next... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c01TsOsr3-c

Oh! I am mistaken then. I assumed the extra meeting was one time only to come to a conclusion. I am sorry.

let's see what happens next week on next meeting then :)

this lecture is open, yes? I don't see it in my calendar...maybe i subscribed to a different one? i watched this one but unsure where to go next... https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c01TsOsr3-c

yeah that's the lecture, I've just removed the event from the calendar
we had by mistake a recurring calendar event about the lecture
we will have a meeting next week, at that point we can discuss again if a new meeting is worth
@Hanif Ariffin if you're wondering what to do, the idea was to watch that lecture and fill a chapter about it
:laughter_tears: I am fine if others really think it should be recurring and every week. I am confused myself so asked here.
no no, I don't think it makes sense :)
but whatever people want to do
anyway, let's sync about all this stuff next meeting
@Hanif Ariffin we are filling this document https://paper.dropbox.com/doc/Ty-lecture-summary--AmTyuUz5MYUQpFr21bhQpE8WAg-4jFj9bVOLlW7uhIOWHITX
thanks for the info :)
do you want to be included in @_WG-learning ?
so once we mention the team you receive a notification
sure, if thats okay
done
thank you @Santiago Pastorino !
Having a meeting every week is a bit hard on my schedule... I don't mind making the bi-weekly sync meeting 1hour and using the remainder to work on the chapter though
ok, there's some confusion that I've caused, we are not planning on having weekly meetings
there was a mistake in the calendar and I was confused because I thought we've talked about going over the ty lecture again and doing a new meeting
but all was a confusion I have
so we don't have a weekly meeting just the regular one
we may schedule something but that would come out of our regular meetings if happens
Sorry if I confused folks even more.
